//B) tulosta datasetistä korkein volyymi ja sen päivämäärä
export function biggestvolume(dataset){var biggest_volume=0;var biggest_volume_day=null;var datalenght=Object.keys(dataset["total_volumes"]).length;for(var i=0;i<datalenght;i++){if(dataset["total_volumes"][i][1]>biggest_volume){biggest_volume=dataset["total_volumes"][i][1];biggest_volume_day=dataset["total_volumes"][i][0];}}var dateObject=new Date(biggest_volume_day);var biggest_volume_day_to_date=dateObject.toLocaleString();return[biggest_volume_day_to_date,biggest_volume];}
